siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
#TeamLeBron vs. #TeamDurant | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | March 7, 2021

Team LeBron defeated Team Durant, 170-150. Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded 35 PTS(16-16 FG, 3-3 3pt FG) for Team LeBron, setting a #NBAAllStar Game record for most FGM without a miss (previously Hal Greer, 8-8 FG on 01/23/1968). Damian Lillard (32 PTS, 8 3PM) and Stephen Curry (28 PTS, 8 3PM) combined for 60 PTS for Team LeBron in the victory. Kyrie Irving tallied 24 PTS, 6 REB and 12 AST for Team Durant, while Bradley Beal added a team-high 26 PTS.

Subscribe to the NBA: https://on.nba.com/2JX5gSN 

Full Game Highlights Playlist: https://on.nba.com/2rjGMge

For news, stories, highlights and more, go to our official website at https://nba_webonly.app.link/nbasite

blogPost.body:
#TeamLeBron vs. #TeamDurant | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | March 7, 2021

Team LeBron defeated Team Durant, 170-150. Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded 35 PTS(16-16 FG, 3-3 3pt FG) for Team LeBron, setting a #NBAAllStar Game record for most FGM without a miss (previously Hal Greer, 8-8 FG on 01/23/1968). Damian Lillard (32 PTS, 8 3PM) and Stephen Curry (28 PTS, 8 3PM) combined for 60 PTS for Team LeBron in the victory. Kyrie Irving tallied 24 PTS, 6 REB and 12 AST for Team Durant, while Bradley Beal added a team-high 26 PTS.

It's Monday 8 March 2021. Our top stories this morning 0:00

The Duke and Duchess of Sussex's much-anticipated interview with Oprah Winfrey has aired in the US - with the couple sharing their side of the story about life in the Royal Family.

The couple spoke about their relationships with other royals, racism and how their mental health suffered.

Meghan spoke with Oprah for most of the interview, before being joined by Prince Harry.

Get the full story 👉 http://bbc.in/3rqBdH3
